name: Maze Forever
summary: Maze Forever gives you the benefit of countless hours of fun while polishing your puzzle solving skills. A beautiful minimalistic design helps you focus on the gameplay while enjoying each well crafted puzzle level. Golden coins are sprinkled in random locations and you’ll need to collect them to unlock special characters and maze themes. The ultimate goal is to access the worldwide leaderboards and show off to the world how good your puzzle solving skills are. Think you are smart enough to do it? There’s only one way to find out, install Maze Forever!
